column.name: SM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '

                  声  明  书

' +'

立项小组成员与本次参与表决的项目是否存在以下需要回避表决的情形：(请选择“是”或“否”)

' +'

1、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目的项目组成员（包括该项目其他中介机构项目组成员）；

' +'

2、本人或直系亲属直接或间接持有待表决项目相关公司的股份等权益；

' +'

3、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目相关公司的董事、监事、高级管理人员，或为待表决项目相关公司的实际控制人；

' +'

4、本人与待表决项目的项目组，归属于公司同一投行业务部门（团队），或待表决项目的项目组属于本人分管的承做部门（团队）；

' +'

5、待表决项目由委员本人或其直系亲属，或其直系亲属担任董事、监事、高级管理人员的单位承揽或协助承揽。

' +'

 

'

column.name: SFHB
column.comment: '<font color=red>如存在声明中的情形，请在是否回避中选择“是”！<font>'

column.name: BJYJ
column.option: 1|同意;3|有条件同意;4|暂缓;2|不同意

column.name: SJLY
column.option: 0|本系统;1|原投行系统;2|协同系统

column.name: XTLCLJ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='http://oa.ebscn.com/workflow/request/ViewRequest.jsp?requestid='+OLDBH; '' //'下载'

column.name: SQSM
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>在底稿系统中完成“项目承揽及立项阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起立项流程。<font>'

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_GS_LXLC_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFDYSJZQ==0||ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_GS_LXLC_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

column.name: CLLXJDBL
column.describe: 承揽及立项阶段上传比例
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("CLLXJDBL").setLabel("底稿系统项目承揽及立项阶段上传比例");

column.name: SFCRHXGLZR
column.describe: 是否承担后续管理责任

column.name: FXRSFWSSGS
column.describe: 发行人是否为上市公司

column.name: FXRMGSSFWSSGS
column.describe: 发行人母公司是否为上市公司

column.name: NMXXDJB
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/excelOut?ywlx=120000&insid='+InstID+'&lcbd=LCIB_GS_LXLC'; '' //'下载'

column.name: SFWCLYCTJC
column.describe: 是否完成利益冲突核查

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBSFYYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0&&ZKBSFYYJ==null
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") ==0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: SHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ZKBSFYYJ != 1||ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBDGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: DGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: QTSHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: QTYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBSHYJHZ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1= ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_GS_LXLC_ZKBSHYJHZ where lcIB_GS_LXLC_ID=?",[ID]);
(cnt1==0&&cnt2==0)||( cnt1==1 && ZKBSFYYJ==null)

column.name: CJSHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 1&& CJSHYJ==null
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 1

column.name: ZKBSHYJ1
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||CJSHYJ != 1

column.name: ZKBJYFJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'") ;
(((CJSHYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1 ) && cnt1==0) || (cnt1==1&&ZKBJYFJ==null)
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 1

column.name: ZKYJHF
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'") ;
(((CJSHYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1 )&&cnt1==0)||(((ZKBSFYYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1 )&&cnt1==1)

column.name: XMZDZKBSHYJHF
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'") ;
(((CJSHYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1 )&&cnt1==0)||(((ZKBSFYYJ!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,99)==99)||ABS_NULLSUB(YSYJ,1)!=1 )&&cnt1==1)

column.name: CJSHYJ2

<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'") ;
(((CJSHYJ2!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(ESYJ,-1)==-1)||ABS_NULLSUB(ESYJ,1)!=1 )&&cnt1==0)||(cnt1==1&&ZKBJYFJ2==null)
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 1

column.option: 1|线上立项表决;2|线下立项表决

column.name: BJJG
column.option: 1|通过;2|有条件通过;-1|不通过;0|暂缓

column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> JRLXBJBZ!=1 ||(ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'" ) == 1&& CJSHYJ3==null)

<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>

(((CJSHYJ3!=1&&ABS_NULLSUB(SSYJ,-1)==-1)||ABS_NULLSUB(SSYJ,1)!=1 )&&cnt1 ==0 )||(cnt1==1&&ZKBJYFJ3==null)

column.describe: 选择是否出具立项决议

column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

column.name: QTLXCL
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from JGCRM.lbmember where orgid IN (13831) and roleid IN (3,4) and userid = ?",[$Login.User])==0 &&ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from JGCRM.lbmember where orgid IN (13834) and roleid = 3 and userid = ?",[$Login.User])==0 &&ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_LCYJJLB where yjr = ? and jsr = ?",[ZKSBZS,$Login.User])==0 && ZKSBZS !=$Login.User && $Login.User!= 0

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_LXLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_GS_LXLC&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_XYSP' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0
